peregrine.task
Class BaseMapperTask

java.lang.Object
  peregrine.task.BaseTask
      peregrine.task.BaseMapperTask
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.util.concurrent.Callable, Task
Direct Known Subclasses:
MapperTask, MergerTask
public abstract class BaseMapperTask
extends BaseTask
implements java.util.concurrent.Callable

Base task for all task that read input from external systems or the filesystem (or pipes). In practice this boils down to map and merge tasks.
